name: elegantthemes-javascript-style
description: A mostly reasonable approach to JavaScript.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config:base
scripts.install:config: cd packages/eslint-config && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run --silent test:config && npm run --silent test:config:base
scripts.travis: npm run --silent travis:config && npm run --silent travis:config:base
